alert.note: Alert for Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:40PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Brazoria and east central Matagorda Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 740 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brazoria, or near Lake Jackson, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Jackson, Angleton, Freeport, Clute, West Columbia, Sweeny, Surfside Beach, Richwood, Brazoria, Jones Creek, Oyster Creek, Holiday Lakes, Bailey`s Prairie, Sargent and Wild Peach Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
